title: The God of Calamity Wishes for Naught
description:
Ancient Egypt, a time when Gods ruled the world.

The Wargod Set who wishes for war, harbors dissatisfaction with his elder brother, the country's current ruler Osiris, who aims for a "World without War".

One day, at Osiris' behest, Set and his brother sneak out of the palace. The one moment Set takes his eyes off his brother, Osiris is assassinated. Suspected of treason, Set is condemned to be executed... or so he thought.

Upon opening his eyes in his own room, before Set stood Osiris who should have been dead———?!
